Actions.Name: Necrotize
Actions.AreaEffect: Foes take 2 piercing damage. Self and allies gain vigor 2.
Actions.Effects: The [name] gains Aura 2 until the start of its next turn. Foes that end their turn in the aura must sacrifice 2 and have a grasping dead space created under them. While inside a grasping hands space foes are sealed+ and cannot gain vigor.
